articles.title: Trump voters say they will accept the results, win or lose
articles.description: Voters on both sides say they -- and their candidate -- will accept the results of the 2020 election, win or lose. But voters also say they're very worried about what their opponents will do. CNN's Donie O'Sullivan reports from a Trump rally in Wisconsin.
